entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
